Rulings.Base:
1. The effect to destroy 1 card your opponent controls starts a Chain and targets.
2. If multiple "Resonator" monsters are used as Synchro Materials at the same time, you can only destroy 1 card your opponent controls.
3. You do not destroy 1 card your opponent controls if you use a monster like "Phantom of Chaos" whose effect has changed it into a "Resonator" monster.
4. If the Synchro Summon is negated, you do not destroy 1 monster your opponent controls.
5. Destroying this card during your 2 nd End Phase is not an effect, does not start a Chain, and cannot be negated.

PSCT.Base: Each time a "Resonator" monster(s) is sent to the Graveyard as a Synchro Material: Target 1 card your opponent controls; destroy that target. Destroy this card during your 2nd End Phase after activation.
